name: Ghost Pal
description:
Can you escape this dungeon. Try to...

This game was made 2 days before the deadline of the game jam. Didn't have time to pretty much do anything. No sound effects, no main menu, buggy gameplay.. Please read the Controls below, because there is no teaching controls in the game. Yeah, didn't have time to do that too. :DD :(

Weekly Game Jam: Week 192.

Theme: Haunted object

(IMPORTANT!) Controls:

ESC to quit the game

WASD to move & jump.

TAB to switch around ghost's mode between helping and following.

ARROW KEYS to move around the ghost when it is in helping mode.

The boy cannot jump when he is on the ghost.
